The Triple Path shows a path and approach for life in the modern age. The ancient cosmologies and disproved beliefs of the world's major religions are increasingly dissatisfying and irrelevant to growing numbers of people. On the other hand, religion brings many benefits for which the New Atheists have been unable to provide a viable alternative.

Taking a tone sympathetic to the views of both religious and atheist readers alike, the Triple Path offers a credible synthesis of modern scientific knowledge and the useful teachings and practices of the world's major religions, making use of the latest scientific research and referencing hundreds of peer-reviewed academic papers. Most importantly, it collects the most moving words of wisdom of the world's great sacred texts and then updates and adds to them to create a new approach relevant to life today.

You can read more about the book (and download the latest edition for free) at TriplePath.org.
